wikitext.*:
[[File:Duchess Road old.jpg|thumb]] 

'''37 Duchess Road''' in [[Birmingham|Edgbaston]], was the home of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and his brother [[Hilary Tolkien|Hilary]] from [[1908]] to [[1910]]. They were let a room  by a Mrs. Faulkner. Duchess Road is behind the [[Birmingham Oratory]]. It was at this time that Tolkien first met [[Edith Tolkien|Edith Bratt]].<ref name=CG>{{CG|C}}, p. 13</ref>
